Product Detail Section.Layout: Two-column layout with a focus on product imagery on the left and detailed product information on the right.
Product Detail Section.Design: Visual-centric and user-friendly. Multiple product images arranged in a grid on the left side, with a primary large image and secondary smaller images. The right side focuses on product details, ratings, color and size options, pricing, and action buttons.

Key Elements.Image Gallery: Multiple images showcasing the product, with one highlighted large image and smaller supporting images.
Key Elements.Product Name: Prominently displayed with an optional brand name.
Key Elements.Rating: Includes star rating and number of ratings.
Key Elements.Color Options: Selectable color circles for visual clarity.
Key Elements.Size Options: Clickable size options, indicating available and unavailable sizes.
Key Elements.Pricing: Displays the current price with an optional discount price.
Key Elements.Shipping Notice: Estimated shipping time to inform customers.
Key Elements.Action Buttons: Buttons for adding the product to cart and buying immediately.

Product Detail Section.Use Cases: Ideal for e-commerce websites, particularly for fashion and accessories. This layout helps in presenting the product attractively and providing all necessary details for a purchase decision.
